item.title: Samvat 2079: What Market Experts Make Of The Year Ahead
item.description: Samvat 2079: What Market Experts Make Of The Year Ahead While risks remain amid geopolitical strife and liquidity tightening, Indian markets are expected to fare well in Samvat 2079.

item.title: Top Stock Picks For Samvat 2079: Brokerages
item.description: Top Stock Picks For Samvat 2079: Brokerages Here’s a list of top Diwali stock picks by brokerages.

item.title: Rishi Sunak Is A New And Old-Fashioned Tory
item.description: Rishi Sunak Is A New And Old-Fashioned Tory The next UK prime minister is a fascinating mix of the new and the old in the world of the ruling Conservative Party.

item.title: Rishi Sunak Tells UK Tories To Unite As He Strives To Fix ‘Crisis’
item.description: Rishi Sunak Tells UK Tories To Unite As He Strives To Fix ‘Crisis’ Rishi Sunak called on his warring Conservative Party to unite as the UK’s incoming prime minister bids to fix the crisis facing the economy.

item.title: Sunak Edges Closer to UK Leadership Prize As Johnson Caves
item.description: Sunak Edges Closer to UK Leadership Prize As Johnson Caves Boris Johnson pulled out of the race to lead the UK’s ruling Conservative Party and the nation, ending a bid to replace Liz Truss as prime minister.
